term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - crystal diffraction spectrometer
term.title: crystal diffraction spectrometer

item.text: A spectrometer, in which diffraction by a crystal is used to obtain the energy spectra of electromagnetic radiation as well as of slow neutrons.

sources.item: PAC, 1982, 54, 1533. 'Glossary of terms used in nuclear analytical chemistry (Provisional)' on page 1552 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac198254081533)
